Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=81±7 µM), Mycosphaerella arachidicola (IC50=75±5 µM), Physalospora piricola (IC50=89±4 µM), Rhizoctomia solani (IC50=134±2 µM), Botrytis cinerea (IC50=109±5 µM), Coprinus comatus (IC50=122±7 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has strong antifungal activity. Inhibits the proliferation of leukemia cells in vitro. Inhibits human immunodeficiency virus-1 (HIV-1) reverse transcriptase (IC50=41 µM). Lacks mitogenic activity towards murine splenocytes.

Literature.Title: Coccinin, an antifungal peptide with antiproliferative and HIV-1 reverse transcriptase inhibitory activities from large scarlet runner beans.
Literature.Author: Ngai PH, Ng TB.
